verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G2980>spake<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3101>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>,
saying <S%G3004><s%>, The <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2523>sit<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2515>seat<s%>:

all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3745>whatsoever<s%> they <S%G2036>bid<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G5083>these<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5083>observe<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4160>ye<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

Yea <S%G1063><s%>, they <S%G1195>bind<s%> <S%G926>heavy<s%> <S%G5413>burdens<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> grievous to be <S%G1419>borne<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2007>lay<s%> them <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>'s <S%G5606>shoulders<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> they themselves <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2795>move<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1147>with<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1147>finger<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> they <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> be <S%G2300>seen<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>: for they make <S%G4115>broad<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G5440>phylacteries<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3170>enlarge<s%> the <S%G2899>borders<s%> <S%G2440>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2440>garments<s%>,
and <S%G5037><s%> <S%G5368>love<s%> the chief <S%G4411>place<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G1173>feasts<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the chief <S%G4410>seats<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%>,
and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G783>salutations<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G58>marketplaces<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to be <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G4461>Rabbi<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2564>call<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> man <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>, even he who <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.
Neither <S%G3366><s%> be ye <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2519>masters<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2519>master<s%>, even the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> he that is <S%G3187>greatest<s%> among <S%G5216>you<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1249>servant<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3748>whosoever<s%> shall <S%G5312>exalt<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be <S%G5013>humbled<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> whosoever <S%G3748>shall<s%> <S%G5013>humble<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be <S%G5312>exalted<s%>.

But <S%G3759>woe<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%>, <S%G5273>hypocrites<s%>! <S%G3754>because<s%> ye <S%G2808>shut<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1715>against<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> enter <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G3756>yourselves<s%>, neither suffer <S%G5210>ye<s%> them that are <S%G1525>entering<s%> in to <S%G1525>enter<s%>.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%>, <S%G5273>hypocrites<s%>! <S%G3754>for<s%> ye <S%G4013>compass<s%> <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3584>land<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4339>proselyte<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he is <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G4160>so<s%>, ye make <S%G846>him<s%> twofold <S%G1362>more<s%> a <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G1067>hell<s%> than <S%G5216>yourselves<s%>.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, ye <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G3595>guides<s%>, that <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G3739>Whosoever<s%> shall <S%G3660>swear<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%>, it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3739>whosoever<s%> shall <S%G3660>swear<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G5557>gold<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple<s%>, he is a <S%G3784>debtor<s%>.

Ye <S%G3474>fools<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5185>blind<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3187>greater<s%>, the <S%G5557>gold<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> that hath <S%G37>sanctified<s%> the <S%G5557>gold<s%>?

And <S%G3739><s%>, <S%G1437>Whosoever<s%> shall <S%G3660>swear<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G2379>altar<s%>, it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G302>whosoever<s%> shall <S%G3660>swear<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G1435>gift<s%> that is <S%G1883>upon<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>, he is a <S%G3784>debtor<s%>.
Ye <S%G5185>blind<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> is <S%G3173>greater<s%>, the <S%G1435>gift<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G2379>altar<s%> that <S%G37>sanctifieth<s%> the <S%G1435>gift<s%>?

He <S%G3660><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> that <S%G3660>sweareth<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G2379>altar<s%>, <S%G3660>sweareth<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G846>thereon<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he that <S%G3660>sweareth<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%>, <S%G3660>sweareth<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> him that <S%G2730>dwelleth<s%> <S%G846>therein<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he that <S%G3660>sweareth<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G3660>sweareth<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> him that <S%G2521>sitteth<s%> <S%G846>thereon<s%>.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%>, <S%G5273>hypocrites<s%>! <S%G3754>for<s%> ye <S%G586>tithe<s%> <S%G2238>mint<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G432>anise<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2951>cummin<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> have left <S%G863>undone<s%> the <S%G926>weightier<s%> matters of the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2532>justice<s%>, and <S%G1656>mercy<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>: but <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G1163>ye<s%> ought to have <S%G4160>done<s%>, <S%G2548>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> to have <S%G863>left<s%> the <S%G2548>other<s%> <S%G863>undone<s%>.
Ye <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G3595>guides<s%>, that strain <S%G1368>out<s%> the <S%G2971>gnat<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2666>swallow<s%> the <S%G2574>camel<s%>!

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%>, <S%G5273>hypocrites<s%>! <S%G3754>for<s%> ye <S%G2511>cleanse<s%> the <S%G1855>outside<s%> of the <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G3953>platter<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2081>within<s%> they are <S%G1073>full<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G724>extortion<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G192>excess<s%>.

Thou <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisee<s%>, <S%G2511>cleanse<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> the <S%G1787>inside<s%> of the <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G3953>platter<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G1622>outside<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> may <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2513>clean<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%>, <S%G5273>hypocrites<s%>! <S%G3754>for<s%> ye are like <S%G3945>unto<s%> <S%G2867>whited<s%> <S%G5028>sepulchres<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1855>outwardly<s%> <S%G5316>appear<s%> <S%G5611>beautiful<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2081>inwardly<s%> <S%G1073>are<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> <S%G3747>of<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G3747>men<s%>'s bones, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3747>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness<s%>.

Even <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1855>outwardly<s%> <S%G5316>appear<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%> unto <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2081>inwardly<s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G5272>hypocrisy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G458>iniquity<s%>.

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%>, <S%G5273>hypocrites<s%>! <S%G3754>for<s%> ye <S%G3618>build<s%> the <S%G5028>sepulchres<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2885>garnish<s%> the <S%G3419>tombs<s%> of the <S%G1342>righteous<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004>say<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> we had <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3962>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%>, <S%G302>we<s%> <S%G1510>should<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> have <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G2844>partakers<s%> with <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>.
Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> ye <S%G3140>witness<s%> to <S%G1438>yourselves<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> ye <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of them that <S%G5407>slew<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>.
Fill <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G4137>up<s%> <S%G2532>then<s%> the <S%G3358>measure<s%> <S%G3962>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>fathers<s%>.
Ye <S%G3789>serpents<s%>, ye <S%G1081>offspring<s%> of <S%G2191>vipers<s%>, how <S%G4459>shall<s%> ye <S%G5343>escape<s%> <S%G575>the<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> of <S%G1067>hell<s%>?

Therefore <S%G5124><s%>, <S%G2400>behold<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> wise <S%G4680>men<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%>: some <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> shall ye <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4717>crucify<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> some <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> shall ye <S%G3146>scourge<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1377>persecute<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%>:

that <S%G3704><s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> may <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G1632>shed<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G6>Abel<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G2197>Zachariah<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G914>Barachiah<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> ye <S%G5407>slew<s%> <S%G3342>between<s%> the <S%G3485>sanctuary<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2379>altar<s%>.
Verily <S%G281><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3956>All<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> shall <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%>.

O <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%>, that <S%G615>killeth<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3036>stoneth<s%> them that are <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>her<s%>! how <S%G4212>often<s%> would I <S%G2309>have<s%> <S%G1996>gathered<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G1996>together<s%>, <S%G3739>even<s%> <S%G5158>as<s%> a <S%G3733>hen<s%> <S%G1996>gathereth<s%> <S%G1438>her<s%> <S%G3556>chickens<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> her <S%G4420>wings<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>!
Behold <S%G2400><s%>, <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> is <S%G863>left<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2048>desolate<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, Ye <S%G1492>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G737>henceforth<s%>, <S%G2193>till<s%> <S%G302>ye<s%> shall <S%G2036>say<s%>, <S%G2127>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.
